properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana prabhu Yesu vachedu vela mana Santosha hrudayaalu chaala velase{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}మన ప్రభుయేసు వచ్చెడు వేళ మన సంతోష హృదయాలు చాల వెలసె{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhoodigantha nivaasulaaraa padilamuga prabhu Yesuni Choochi mudamuga rakshana mari pondandi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaaraayana thattu choodagane vaaralaku velugu Kaligenu vaari mukhambulu lajjimpakunden{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana viswaasamunaku karthayu konasaaginchedu Yesuni choochi vinayamuna parugidu pandemuna{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shishyulu kannuleththi choodaganu Yese kanipinchenu Vinthaganu Moshe Eliyaalu marugairi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu yese mana parimala priyudu murisedamu mana Prabhuvu nandu merise mahimalu mana bhaagyamade{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manchi kaapari mana prabhu Yesu manakai thanadu Praanamu nitchenu vinudi mana rakshakuni pilupu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aanandamutho aarbhaatamutho andamagu shri Yesuni Joochi Halleluyaa yani paadedamu{/lang-eng}
